Title: One Step Too Many
Writer: Aaron Sorkin (created by), Aaron Sorkin, Corinne Kingsbury (story editor), Brendan Fehily (story editor), Ian Reichbach (executive story editor), Camilla Blackett (staff writer), Michael Gunn (story editor), Dana Ledoux Miller (story editor), Adam R. Perlman (staff writer), Elizabeth Peterson (staff writer), Matthew Lopez (staff writer)
Actors: Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill
Plot: Will makes an appearance on an ACN morning show. Jim meets old friends and foes when Hallie comes to visit. The ACN staff interview a general with knowledge of Operation Genoa, but Jerry's handling of the interview may prove costly.
